meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>pasture</kanji> <kanji>teacher</kanji> is one who leads his flock around through life. This is a <vocabulary>pastor</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>minister</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>clergyman</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
